text: William Buller (born 10 March 1929) was an Irish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. His son Alfred "Alfie" Buller competed in equestrian at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1929 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Irish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Ireland Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Bill Buller
